posts.title: Stackbit Beta Review
posts.description: Stackbit is a graphical website creation platform that using modern frameworks. Here are my thoughts on the potential of this platform as an alternative to other sites like WordPress and Squarespace.

posts.title: Desktop Linux for Non-Linux Users
posts.description: An in-depth look at the state of desktop Linux and its accessibility to new users

posts.title: Installing Wine on Ubuntu
posts.description: Wine is a compatibility layer for Windows programs to run on Linux. Learn how to get started with the installation process.

posts.title: Managing Log Files on Ubuntu
posts.description: Log files can easily become oversized when you run into kernel and driver bugs. This is how you can keep them from over-consuming your disk space.
